channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee LLC -- MA for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee LLC -- MA for Windows

item.title: CVE-2020-7312|2024-08-04T09:25:49.054Z -- mcafee%20llc -- ma%20for%20windows
item.description: DLL Search Order Hijacking Vulnerability in the installer in McAfee Agent (MA) for Windows prior to 5.6.6 allows local users to execute arbitrary code and escalate privileges via execution from a compromised folder.

item.title: CVE-2020-7315|2024-08-04T09:25:48.966Z -- mcafee%20llc -- ma%20for%20windows
item.description: DLL Injection Vulnerability in McAfee Agent (MA) for Windows prior to 5.6.6 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via careful placement of a malicious DLL.

item.title: CVE-2020-7311|2024-08-04T09:25:48.970Z -- mcafee%20llc -- ma%20for%20windows
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in the installer in McAfee Agent (MA) for Windows prior to 5.6.6 allows local users to assume SYSTEM rights during the installation of MA via manipulation of log files.
